author: .fjl
content: I have merged `eth_simulateV1` to execution-apis and have also added the generated tests.

author: .fjl
content: I decided to do this since the effort to add it has been such a long one, and we just need to ship it.

author: .fjl
content: There are some failing tests in clients, as discussed on the last eth_simulate call, but it should be possible to resolve them

author: .fjl
content: If you think a specific test is wrong, please yell here and we can adapt it.
